name: 河北港口集团有限公司发文

fields.name: 表头
fields.options:
集团有限公司发文笺
集团有限公司办公室发文笺
集团有限公司委员会发文笺
集团有限公司委员会办公室发文笺
集团有限公司董事会发文笺
集团有限公司董事会办公室发文笺
内部通报

fields.name: 发文类型
fields.options:
政务发文
党务发文
党委、行政联合发文

fields.name: 缓急程度
fields.options:
普通
办文
紧急
特急

instance_template:
{{> afFormGroup name='发文笺' label=false}}
{{#each traces.主要领导批示}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{#each traces.秘书核稿}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{#each traces.分管领导意见}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{> afFormGroup name='拟稿单位' label=false}}

{{>Template.dynamic template="afSelectUser" data=applicantContext}}
{{#each traces.部室领导批示}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{#each traces.主任分签}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{#each traces.部室会签}} {{#if (include judge "approved,rejected,submitted") }} {{judge_name}} {{description}}
  --{{handler_name}}  {{formatDate finish_date}}
{{/if}} {{/each}}
{{> afFormGroup name='主送' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='抄送' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='抄报' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='发文号' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='页数' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='标题' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='拟稿日期' label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name='签发日期' label=false}}

flows.name: 公司发文流程
flows.instance_template:
{{> afFormGroup name="标头" label=false}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="主要领导批示"}}:

{{> instanceSignText name="主要领导批示" field_formula="{signature.traces.主要领导批示}"}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="核稿"}}:

{{> instanceSignText name="核稿" field_formula="{traces.秘书核稿}"}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="分管领导意见"}}
{{> instanceSignText name="分管领导意见" field_formula="{signature.traces.分管领导意见}"}}
{{> afFormGroup name="拟稿单位" label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name="拟稿人" label=false}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="部门负责人意见"}}:

{{> instanceSignText name="部门负责人意见" field_formula="{traces.部门领导批示}"}}
总法律顾问 / 董事会秘书意见
{{> instanceSignText name="总法律顾问意见" field_formula="{signature.traces.总法律顾问意见}"}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="会签意见"}}:

{{> instanceSignText name="会签意见" field_formula="{traces.部室会签}"}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="分签意见"}}
{{> instanceSignText name="分签意见" field_formula="{traces.主任分签}"}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="主送"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="发文类型" label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name="主送" label=false}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="抄送"}}:

{{> afFormGroup name="抄送" label=false}}

{{afFieldLabelText name="抄报"}}:

{{> afFormGroup name="抄报" label=false}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="文件编号"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="文件编号" label=false}} {{afFieldLabelText name="页数"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="页数" label=false}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="文件标题"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="文件标题" label=false}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="record_need"}} {{> afFormGroup name="record_need" label=false}} {{afFieldLabelText name="FONDSID"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="FONDSID" label=false}}
{{afFieldLabelText name="拟稿日期"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="拟稿日期" label=false}} {{afFieldLabelText name="文件日期"}}: {{> afFormGroup name="文件日期" label=false}}
{{> afFormGroup name="priority" label=false}} {{> afFormGroup name="deadline" label=false}}
{{>Template.dynamic template="afSelectUser" data=applicantContext}}
{{formatDate instance.submit_date '{"format":"YYYY-MM-DD"}'}}
